price: Cuando tú y quienes estén contigo se encuentren en el arca, di: ¡Alabado sea Dios, Quien nos salvó de un pueblo de injustos!"
arabic: فَإِذَا ٱسۡتَوَيۡتَ أَنتَ وَمَن مَّعَكَ عَلَى ٱلۡفُلۡكِ فَقُلِ ٱلۡحَمۡدُ لِلَّهِ ٱلَّذِي نَجَّىٰنَا مِنَ ٱلۡقَوۡمِ ٱلظَّٰلِمِينَ

version.title: Spanish Translation - Isa Garcia
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish by Muhammad Isa Garcia - Printed in 1433 H.

meta.transliteration: fa-idhā is'tawayta anta waman maʿaka ʿalā al-ful'ki faquli al-ḥamdu lillahi alladhī najjānā mina al-qawmi al-ẓālimīna
